greetingSubtitle: Python is crawling to browsers while Austrian goverment buys JavaScript. One of these assertions is true, but which one?

cards.title: 5 CSS properties you don't know
cards.description: Author of this article tells about some amazing properties which are not commonly used.
cards.author: Justice-hub

cards.title: Boolean attributes in HTML and ARIA: what's the difference?
cards.description: Some attributes in ARIA are boolean(-like). These attributes may seem a lot like boolean attributes in HTML, but there are some important differences to be aware of.
cards.author: Hidde de Vries

cards.title: grid-template-columns
cards.description: This article details the grid-template-columns property, defining the grid container’s columns by specifying the grid tracks’ size and their line names.
cards.author: Mojtaba Seyedi

cards.title: Taking PyScript to test drive
cards.description: Python moves to JavaScript territoria. Can it compete with JS?
cards.author: Eran Shlomo

cards.title: Why I Avoid SQL Databases
cards.description: Which type of database should your choose and why? This is not complete guide of choosing database, but a good review of pros and cons of NoSQL databases.
cards.author: Bill Wohlers

cards.title: Austria buys JavaScript from Brendan Eich
cards.description: Can you believe that government can buy most popular programming language? God bless it is just a funny blog post, that will make you laugh.
cards.author: Sebastian Carlos

cards.title: Working with SVGs in React Native
cards.description: There are many ways to import and work with SVG images. In this article, we will be looking at different ways of manipulating SVG images in React Native applications.
cards.author: Samaila Bala

cards.title: Vue Offline Page
cards.description: The Internet is not always stable, and therefore, working with Vue, you have the opportunity to display offline pages using state. In the article, the author describes step-by-step instructions.
cards.author: Ahmad Karimzade

cards.title: React Internationalization (i18n) and Localization (l10n) Guide
cards.description: What's the difference between localization and internationalization? Make your app more accessible and better suited for international markets.
cards.author: Ronak Patel
